name: disinflate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to reduce the rate of inflation (= general increase in prices): If you want to disinflate, you have to be ready to accept the higher cost in terms of higher unemployment. In this scenario, it becomes convenient to disinflate the economy.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are short-term costs of disinflating.The only way to disinflate a growing economy is to increase productivity.It became preferable for the central bank to disinflate more quickly.
